TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinkTarget extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可以從其他文件或相同文件的其他位置連結到的頁面項目。

span.span: Represents an element on a page that can be linked to from other documents or other places in the same document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的連結目標的名稱的頁面中的所有會蒐集到的頁面內容部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 這可讓取用端應用程式，以判斷特定的目標是否在特定文件中，而不必載入整個文件。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 如需詳細資訊``並``項目，請參閱第 3 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

summary.span: 取得或設定此 認定為可連結項目的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element that this identifies as a linkable element.

value.span: ，與對應於此 項目之標記項目的 屬性相同。

span.span: A that is identical to the property of the markup element that corresponds to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的連結目標的名稱的頁面中的所有會蒐集到的頁面內容部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 這可讓取用端應用程式，以判斷特定的目標是否在特定文件中，而不必載入整個文件。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 如需詳細資訊``並``項目，請參閱第 3 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]規格其中您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
